review.reviewBody:
Pizza was good, they followed instructions on substitutions.
A little over-cooked, but not bad.
Could use a bit of parchment paper under the pizza as the cardboard got quite soggy and was falling apart.
I love it ! good taste I order is Hawaiian Special Pizza (Large)
it was alright, cheese was a bit thin, but price was lower than some other stores
This is some of the best Hawaiian Special Pizza (Small) I've ever had. We ordered twice on a weekend trip to town.

This is one of the few places that sells larger gluten free pizzas and it did NOT disappoint.
so tasty and I will be able to have leftovers for days!
